casebody.data:
MARY A. ROBINSON, Plaintiff and Appellant, v. ANTHONY ROBINSON, Defendant and Respondent.

Before Monell, Curtis, and Sedgwick, JJ.

Decided June 29, 1872. Appeal from a judgment of Special Term, dismissing the complaint in an action brought to obtain a separation from bed and board, for alleged cruel treatment of plaintiff by defendant. C. H. Truax, for appellant. *562Charles Matthews, for respondent.

Judgment reversed, and new trial ordered, with costs.

Opinion "by Sedgwick, J.
